channel.title: ::makememb? i wanna make members for my server
channel.description:
how do i make it avible? i wanna make an membership option. like donate for member. i need an code for how to setup the meber and how to do it. plz help
~~Rune4u~~
Crom170

item.title: ::makememb? i wanna make members for my server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You’ll need to declare a variable, edit your saving methods, and add this command:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“makemem”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.member = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

}[/code]

That won’t work as it is, you will need to declare ‘member’.

Read full topic
